rules_text:
When Venerated Chimera enters, create a 1/1 white Squirrel creature token with “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, muse 1.” [i](Choose a counter on another permanent you control or a card you own in in exile. Remove it or add another.)[/i]
{2}{W}: Exile Venerated Chimera. You may cast it on a later turn without paying its mana cost.
